Rahman), and the two primary performers (Asha Bhosle, Udit Narayan). The description further corroborates all key metadata points, including the composer, lyricist, movie, and music label. Its significantly higher view count (over 188 million) and likes (over 1.3 million) strongly suggest it is the canonical and most recognized version of the song's music video.
